Title: Manners of Dying
Writer: Jeremy Peter Allen (screenplay), Yann Martel (short story)
Actors: Yves Charbonney, Ron Devost, Roy Dupuis, Gregory Hlady
Plot: Kevin Barlow will die on schedule and according to regulations. Harry Parlington, director of the Cantos execution facility, intends to make sure of it. However Barlow chooses to go, be it ...
